WorkItem.Description: RegionManager.RegisterViewWithRegion currently does not have an overload to accept string representing name of the added View. This feature could be helpful in integrating modules to the application. See this question in Stackoverflow.com: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1671526/integrating-modules-with-application-in-prism-aka-compositewpf
WorkItem.Summary: RegisterViewWithRegion does not have an overload to accept View Name

Comments.Message:
Hi,
You might find the following post (http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami/2011/08/30/prism-how-to-provide-a-name-to-views-added-with-the-view-discovery-approach-3/) useful, where a possible solution is proposed.

I hope you find this helpful.

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami
